review_data.title: Delicious food, but pricey
review_data.content: The buffalo mozzarella and tomatoes were great. The cheese some of the best buffalo mozzarella I have had. The mushroom risotto had an earthy flavor. The spaghetti bolognese was delicious, pasta perfectly al dente, but could have used more of the hearty meat sauce.

review_data.title: Great meal at this lovely little place
